query.name: getCurrentPK
query.sql: select currval('crf_crf_id_seq') as key

query.name: getNextPK
query.sql: select nextval('crf_crf_id_seq') as key

query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE CRF_ID = ?

query.name: findByItemOid
query.sql: select distinct(crf.*) from crf,item_form_metadata ifm,crf_version cv,item i where ifm.item_id = i.item_id and ifm.crf_version_id = cv.crf_version_id and cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id and i.oc_oid = ?

query.name: findByOID
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE OC_OID = ?

query.name: findByName
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE name = ?

query.name: findAnotherByName
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE name = ? and crf_id !=?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE source_study_id=?

query.name: findAllByStatus
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF where status_id=?

query.name: findAllActiveCrfs
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT crf.* FROM crf_version JOIN crf ON crf.crf_id = crf_version.crf_id WHERE crf.status_id = 1 AND crf_version.status_id = 1 ORDER BY crf.name

query.name: findAllByLimit
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF limit 5

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO CRF (STATUS_ID,NAME, DESCRIPTION, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED,OC_OID, AUTO_LAYOUT) VALUES (?,?,?,?,NOW(),?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE CRF SET STATUS_ID=?,NAME=?, DESCRIPTION=?,DATE_UPDATED=NOW(),UPDATE_ID=? WHERE CRF_ID=?

query.name: findVersionNamesForCRF
query.sql: select name, description from crf_version where crf_id=?

query.name: findItemNames
query.sql: SELECT name FROM item

query.name: findItemNamesByCRF
query.sql: select distinct i.name from item i, item_form_metadata ifm,crf_version c where i.item_id= ifm.item_id and ifm.crf_version_id=c.crf_version_id and c.crf_id=?

query.name: findItemGroupNamesByCRF
query.sql: select name from item_group where crf_id=?

query.name: findDefaultVersion
query.sql: select default_version_id from event_definition_crf where crf_id =?

query.name: updateDefaultVersion
query.sql: update event_definition_crf set default_version_id = (select crf_version_id from crf_version where crf_id = ?) where crf_id = ?

query.name: findByVersionId
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM crf c, crf_version v WHERE c.crf_id=v.crf_id AND v.crf_version_id=?

query.name: findAllByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM crf c, crf_version v WHERE c.crf_id=v.crf_id AND v.crf_version_id=?

query.name: findAllActiveByDefinition
query.sql: select distinct c.* from crf c,event_definition_crf edc where edc.study_event_definition_id=? and c.crf_id=edc.crf_id and c.status_id=1 and edc.status_id=1

query.name: findAllActiveUnmaskedByDefinition
query.sql: SELECT * FROM crf WHERE crf_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT crf_id FROM event_definition_crf edc WHERE edc.study_event_definition_id = ? AND edc.event_definition_crf_id NOT IN (SELECT event_definition_crf_id FROM crfs_masking cm WHERE cm.study_event_definition_id = edc.study_event_definition_id AND cm.user_id = ? AND cm.study_id = ?) AND edc.status_id=1 AND study_id = ? AND status_id = 1) AND status_id = 1

query.name: findAllActiveByDefinitions
query.sql: select distinct c.* from crf c,event_definition_crf edc where edc.study_id=? and c.crf_id=edc.crf_id and c.status_id=1 and edc.status_id=1 and (c.source_study_id !=? or c.source_study_id is null)

query.name: findAllActiveByDefinitionsForCurrentStudy
query.sql: select distinct c.* from crf c,event_definition_crf edc where edc.study_id=? and c.crf_id=edc.crf_id and c.status_id=1 and edc.status_id=1

query.name: getCountofCRFs
query.sql: select count(crf.crf_id) from crf where crf.status_id != 5

query.name: getAllCRFNamesFromStudy
query.sql: SELECT distinct name FROM crf WHERE crf_id IN (SELECT distinct crf_id FROM event_definition_crf WHERE study_id=?)

query.name: deleteCrfByCrfId
findAllEvaluableCrfs
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM event_definition_crf edc JOIN study s ON (s.study_id = ? OR s.parent_study_id = ?) JOIN crf c ON c.crf_id = edc.crf_id JOIN crf_version cv ON cv.crf_id = edc.crf_id JOIN study_subject ss ON ss.study_id = s.study_id AND ((c.status_id = 1 AND cv.status_id = 1 AND edc.status_id = 1) OR (SELECT count(DISTINCT ec.event_crf_id) FROM event_crf ec WHERE ec.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id = cv.crf_version_id AND ec.not_started = false) > 0) WHERE edc.evaluated_crf = TRUE AND edc.hide_crf = FALSE AND ( s.parent_study_id IS NULL AND ( (edc.study_id = s.study_id) OR (edc.study_id IN (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id = s.study_id)) ) OR ( s.parent_study_id IS NOT NULL AND (edc.study_id = s.study_id OR edc.study_id = s.parent_study_id) AND edc.event_definition_crf_id NOT IN (SELECT parent_id FROM event_definition_crf edc WHERE edc.study_id = s.study_id) ) ) ORDER BY c.name
